title: Keyword Research - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: By: Michael Cole May 3, 2022 Daily SEO Fix: Competitive Keyword Research Competitive Research | Keyword Research Before you begin your quest to find new keywords, you need to know exactly who your competitors are. In this newest Daily Fix, some of our best and brightest Mozzers will show you what you need to do to get the most out of Moz Pro’s Competitive Research tools, which allow you to find your true competitors, what keywords they rank for, and what their top performing content is. Read this post By: Zoe Ashbridge December 1, 2021 How to Use Keyword Clustering to Seamlessly Optimize Your SEO Content Search Engines | Keyword Research Keyword clustering is the SEO tactic to use if you want to seamlessly optimize your SEO content and streamline your workflow at the same time. The best part? It’s fairly simple, and SERPs give you all the information you need to make an informed decision on exactly how to do it. Read this post By: Nicole Hallberg July 22, 2021 Using Keywords in YouTube Videos: How to Get More Views Video | Keyword Research The key to getting more views on YouTube isn’t to be special enough or loud enough to get noticed, but to tag your content with detail-rich identifying information, making it searchable for viewers already looking for videos like yours. Read this post By: Ann Smarty June 29, 2021 How to Optimize for Your Own Branded Search Keyword Research | Branding Brand-driven search is so much more than the URLs you see ranking for your brand name. It’s an ongoing process that will result in higher conversions and more predictable buying journeys. Read this post By: Michael Cole May 13, 2021 Daily SEO Fix: Advanced Keyword Explorer Metrics and Reporting Tips Moz Tools | Keyword Research In these Daily SEO Fix videos, we show you how you can use Moz’s keyword metrics to help you evaluate how much of an impact ranking for certain keywords will have. Read this post By: Dr. Peter J. Meyers April 21, 2021 Long Tail SEO in 2021: How You Can Have It All or Die Trying Keyword Research | Advanced SEO | Competitive Research Due to Google’s advancements in Natural Language Processing, the long tail of search has exploded. However, I will argue that NLP has also imploded the long tail, and understanding how and why may save our collective sanity. Read this post By: Adriana Stein April 15, 2021 How to Use Low Search Volume Keywords to Optimize B2B Tech Content Keyword Research | On-page SEO | Content Marketing For competitive niches, small addressable markets, or both, turn to this proven approach when trying to grow targeted organic traffic and brand awareness: targeting low search volume keywords. Read this post By: Cody McDaniel March 12, 2021 How to Select Meaningful B2B SEO Keywords Keyword Research | On-page SEO | Whiteboard Friday It’s no secret that B2B marketing is different than B2C. The sales cycle is longer, there are multiple stakeholders involved, and it’s usually more expensive. To market effectively, you need to create content that helps, educates, and informs your clientele. The best way to do that is to identify the keywords that matter most to them, and build out content accordingly. Read this post By: Larissa Lacerda February 3, 2021 Fast & Featured: How Entities Can Help You Conquer Snippets in Less Than 4 Minutes Search Engines | Keyword Research Larissa Lacerda of Rock Content demonstrates how to win snippets quickly by focusing your strategy on search entities. Read this post By: Imogen Davies January 28, 2021 Finding Keyword Opportunities Without Historical Data Keyword Research | On-page SEO 3.5 billion queries are searched every day, and 525 million of those queries are brand new. That is a huge number of opportunities waiting to be identified and worked into strategies, optimization, and content plans. The trouble is, all of the usual keyword research tools are, at best, a month behind with the data they can provide. Read this post By: Kerry Duggan November 23, 2020 Daily SEO Fix: Collecting, Organizing, and Tracking Keywords with Moz Pro Keyword Research | Moz Tools We want our customers to know the most effective ways to use Moz Pro to get keyword data, so we’ve put together these Daily Fix videos to help you do just that! Read this post By: Cyrus Shepard May 8, 2020 A Must-Have Keyword Research Process for Winning SEO Keyword Research | Whiteboard Friday Smart keyword research forms the basis of all successful SEO. In today's Whiteboard Friday, Cyrus Shepard shares the basics of a winning keyword research process that you can learn and master in a short amount of time. Plus, sign up for his free webinar on May 21, 'Build a Winning Keyword Strategy: Start-to-Finish'! Read this post By: Cyrus Shepard April 22, 2020 Announcing: The Keyword Research Master Guide Moz News | Keyword Research Why a new guide? Often in SEO, we get so preoccupied with technical SEO (pagination, site speed, the latest Python course, etc.) that we forget the basis of winning SEO begins and ends with keywords. Not choosing keywords before you start with SEO means shooting in the dark — a likely losing gamble if your content will succeed or not.Choosing the wrong keywor... Read this post By: Rand Fishkin February 21, 2020 Which of My Competitor's Keywords Should (& Shouldn't) I Target? - Best of Whiteboard Friday Keyword Research | Whiteboard Friday | Competitive Research Which of your competitor's keywords are worth targeting, and which can be ignored? Learn how to tell the difference in this fan favorite Whiteboard Friday. Plus, save a seat our upcoming webinar, Competitive Analysis for SEO: Size Up & Surpass Your Search Rivals! Read this post
